sentence.idiomatic: Please give me a few rolls of paper.
Is this roll of electrical wire useful?
Altogether how many rolls of film did you bring?
He has a pencil.
That ball team won the game.
How many cigarettes did he smoke?
After you take these few packages of medicine you will get well.
He bought a box of chocolates.
While you' re at it, could you bring me one or two boxes of tea?
He moved the luggage one by one into the car.
How much is one box of apples?
He tidied up quite a few boxes of old things.
In a word, is it that you don't want to go?
In a word, I think going out on the weekend is the most suitable.
Anyway, I don't really like watching movies.
Which department do you work in?
He works in the Tech Department.
Our company is divided into many departments.
Can you drop her off at home along the way?
When you go to the shop, please buy a folder for me while you're there.
I went to see a friend on the way home.
If you have a problem you can contact our After-sale Department.
This brand's after-sale service is good.
If problems arise within three days after purchase, you can exchange it.
Are the shop's prices fair?
What he says isn't very reasonable. We don't need to listen to him.
Please don't worry. He handles things very fairly.
How dare you buy something which has no guarantee on the quality?
If we can't get a pledge on the time, we won't leave.
Your safety is more guaranteed here.
Are your wedding supplies all ready?
This shop sells articles for children.
Our office supplies are used up.
Miss Zhang, our office supplies are almost used up again. Come over and itemize what we need to order. Hmm, how is this supplier?
Quite good. Their quality is garanteed. Their prices are fair and they delivery is fast. Their after-sale service is also pretty good.
That’s good. Hmm, we need two boxes of A4 printer paper, 10 boxes of ballpoint pens, 50 markers. Hey, you think about it… what else do we still need?
We also need 10 boxes of staples, 100 file folders, and 50 rolls of cellophane tape.

Yikes, we sure use up these things quickly. Oh right, we also don’t have that many notebooks, so while you’re at it order some of those. OK, that’s all I want. Also, go ask at each department and find out what they need.
I understand. After I’ve finished asking them, I’ll go this afternoon to order the supplies. They can deliver them by tomorrow.
In any case, the faster the better.
